Our mattresses are super thick, and the linens are snuggly soft and plush.  Not only are there several vital features available right inside your capsule, such as in-built universal plugs, and USB charger ports, but we’ve also added lights that dim, soundproofing, and air vents inside to create the ideal temperature.  Come to CUBE for a sleep experience like none other. Capsule Types Single Capsule: Each made-to-measure capsule comfortably accommodates one person, and there are handy, secure nooks located beneath each platform-style bed to store your belongings in the shared rooms. Queen Capsule: Larger queen capsules are designed to sleep two people side by side.  These capsules are in shared room accommodations or can be booked in a private room. Female-only Capsule:  Your capsule will be located in a shared room with females only.  Private Capsule: Book a private capsule to ensure total seclusion from the outside world. Our private capsule rooms can accommodate two or four people. We combine favourite hotel features and amenities, the friendly atmosphere of a connected community, and a capsule sleep experience that is bucket-list worthy-- all at surprisingly wallet-friendly rates.  Be the best you you can be while in Singapore: Enjoy great sleep, spot-on advice from our hotel staff on what you should do, see and eat, and the ideal mix of complimentary amenities that lets you spend your travel dollars where it matters- on creating amazing travel memories.  Welcome to CUBE! Location Conveniently located in the heart of Kampong Glam, directly in front of Sultan Masjid Mosque, our hotel provides easy access to Singapore’s key cultural and historic tourist attractions, great restaurants of all kinds (including the on-site Japanese restaurant, Yasu Grill), and is just a short ride away by MRT from popular destinations such as the Singapore Indoor Stadium, Suntec, and Gardens by the Bay.  Just a few minutes’ walk from Bugis MRT station- you can really step out of our doors, straight into the action. CUBE Hotels feature a collection of comfortable capsules in shared or private rooms, each a cosy cocoon hidden from the outside world.  Each capsule is designed with meticulous attention to detail. Come to CUBE for a sleep experience like none other. Female-only Capsule: Your capsule will be located in a shared room with females only.  Private Capsule:  Book a private capsule to ensure total seclusion from the outside world. Our private capsule rooms can accommodate two or six people. description: River City Inn is located in the heart of the Singapore city, less than 3 minutes walk away from the Singapore River, and 5 minutes walk away from a MRT (tube/metro) train station. River City Inn is a family-owned and operated hostel. As travellers ourselves, we know that affordability should never compromise hospitality. Everything you need to provide a comfortable stay are available: Free Wi-Fi, Clean Sheets, Good Breakfast, Air-Conditioning, Discounted attraction tickets and more! But at River City Inn, we aim to offer something more. After you have explored the winding streets of Singapore, experienced the different cultures, delighted your taste buds and worn your shoes under the sweltering heat, we want to welcome you back. We want to offer you a place to unwind, write your journal, talk to other travelers and share stories. We aim not only to provide a bed for the night, but a space for the exchange of ideas, inspirations, personal reflections and growth. Because that is what traveling is about. Terms & Conditions: • For non-refundable bookings: Booking made is non-refundable in the event of cancellation or modification. Payment will be charged to your card prior to arrival. • For refundable bookings: We have a 7 days cancellation policy. Please note that we DO NOT accept check-in after 23:00. Please respect our check-in time after 14:00 as we have to adhere to our cleaning schedule (12:00-14:00) to upkeep the cleanliness of the hostel. Our reception operates from 09:00 to 23:00. Late check in 23:00 to 01:30 is chargeable at S$8 per booking. Late check in 01:30 to 02:00 is chargeable at S$16 per booking.Prior arrangement required. • Check-out time: 12:00. One night's stay will be chargeable for late check out past 12:00. • If you have an early flight, you may leave your luggage with us(after 7am on the check-in date) and use our facilities before heading out to explore the city. A booking for the previous night is required should you need a bed to rest immediately upon arrival from 07:00 to 14:00 on your check-in day. • If you have a late flight or bus to catch on the day of your check-out, you may leave your bags with us at no additional cost until 22:00. • To keep our prices low, we accept cash (in Singapore dollars) only for payment. Payment with credit card is subjected to a 5% administrative charge. • The air-con in the dorms are turned on continuously for 12 hours throughout the night (21:00 to 09:00). The dorms are ventilated with fans in the day. The common area is fully air-conditioned during the day. • To upkeep the environment of a backpackers hostel, we do not accommodate children below the age of 5. Children aged between 5 and 11 years can be accommodated in private rooms only, and not in dormitories. Children aged 12 and above can be accommodated either in private rooms or in dormitories. • Due to limited capacity, we do not accept Singaporeans/returning locals/PR/Foreigners holding work permits. Please contact us before booking whenever in doubt. • Please note that we are located on the 4th floor of a heritage shophouse without a lift. • To upkeep the cleanliness of the hostel, no footwear is allowed indoors (except in the toilets). Guest may wear socks if they are not comfortable barefooted. • We will hold all bookings up to 3 hours of your scheduled arrival time. Kindly inform us if you have any changes to your arrival time. • We do not accept big groups above 8pax. Please contact us  prior to booking for large group bookings. • Please note that not all our rooms/dormitories have windows. If you need to stay in a room with windows, please check with us before booking. By booking with us, you agree with the above stated terms and conditions. ** Non- refundable booking (Pre payment required) Full balance due will be charged by property after the booking has been made. description: Draper Startup House joined forces with the Draper Startup ecosystem to help execute the enablement of ONE MILLION entrepreneurs by the end of 2030. Through the use of real human connection, inspired business travel, a diverse-minded community and access to global citizens - one is able to connect to new opportunities, inspire one another to innovate and execute, and empower one another to go big, give back, and drive progress. Draper Startup House - Singapore Draper Startup House is an entrepreneurial centric accommodation located in the heritage shophouse of the oldest Chinese family in Singapore. Every brick and tile of this building is coated with the DNA of entrepreneurial spirit. DSH is located a short 3-5 minutes walk from 2 different MRT Stations (Chinatown and Tanjong Pagar), which makes getting around the city a breeze. Singapore’s busiest and most famous hawker and food centres (Maxwell Food Centre, Amoy Street Food Centre, and Chinatown Food Street) are at our doorstep - ensuring you will not go hungry, even on the tightest budget! Enjoy the close distance to the bustling city life, as well as having the ease of a comfortable work environment and access to a global startup network. DSH enables you to drive progress through an unparalleled work environment, as well as urges you to explore through a close approximation to mouth-watering hawker food, a central location, and a quintessential Singaporean experience - we can’t wait to be a part of your global journey! See you in Singapore! We have two beautiful co-working spaces where you can spend the day working peacefully on your venture. We have a communal kitchen and we also offer a simple free breakfast every morning which includes a free flow of coffee, tea, milk and juice. All rooms are mixed dorms with capsule beds and come equipped with air-conditioning and personal lockers. There are no ensuite rooms; toilets and shower facilities are communal. Welcome to Draper Startup House!  View House Rules

description: Nested in one of the most culturally riched neighborhood in Singapore - Kampong Glam (Arab Street) - Tree In Lodge offers the most convenient access to most of the historical and vibrant sites in downtown Singapore. A two-time Best Hostel “HOSCAR Award” recipient, Tree In Lodge continues to be run by passionate travel enthusiasts catering to the needs of like-minded backpackers seeking affordable, comfortable and friendly accommodation in one of the most expensive cities in Asia. As travelers ourselves, we love the connections with the people we meet in hostels. However, the most valuable experience is often with locals who willingly share and reach out to us. Over in Tree In Lodge, we believe in this connection. Over here, you arrive as a guest, you leave as a friend. At Tree In Lodge, we aim to be green, responsible without sacrificing your comfort. Environmentally friendly, non toxic laundry wash to cleaning agents, we are in this together for a green living environment. All dormitories are air-conditioned and each guest is equipped with his/her own locker and a reading light. The beds are also installed with curtains for greater privacy. There are also female-only dormitories. A common area with Internet access, free WI-FI, books is also available for guests to hang around. The hostel is accessible via security card access so guests can come in/out at any time. Simple local breakfast is available the whole day. Terms & Conditions Cancellation policy: 3 days before arrival. In case of a late cancellation or No Show, you will be charged the first night of your stay. Check in from 14:00 to 21:00  . *Please arrange check-in timing with us should you arrive later than 21:00. Check out before 11:00 . Reception hours: 08:30 to 21:00 . Taxes included. Breakfast included. No curfew. Non smoking. Cash only.  View House Rules

description: Located in the city centre, in the heart of historic Little India, we're close to everything which a backpacker could possibly need - bus stations, MRT (subway) stations, cheap eats, supermarkets, money changers, ATMs, post office, places of interest, etc. We're also the only hostel in Singapore to be appointed an official Singapore Visitor Centre by the Tourism Board. You can be sure we know our stuff! We understand the needs of budget travelers and are here to help you save $$$. At our hostel, you enjoy free breakfast, free lockers, free internet access, and free guided tours. Come join us on our Free Kick Scooter Tours of the city... and if weather permits, our island-hopping tours on our very own boat! We offer DISCOUNT tickets to various attractions in Singapore (e.g. Universal Studios, SEA Aquarium, Zoo, Night Safari, River Safari, etc). We also serve the cheapest cold beer in the entire Singapore (ah...the privileges of our guests)! After walking around the whole day, kick back with a cold beer, curl up on our couch with a good book, veg out in front of the tv, or have a laugh with friends you make at the hostel. Whether you're a virgin or seasoned traveler, you'll find the backpacker atmosphere here simply unbeatable! Come experience the funky vibes... **We've a minimum age requirement of 17 years i.e. all travelers staying with us must be at least 17 years old. This policy was adopted, after receiving feedback from backpackers for a considerable length of time, to preserve the backpackers' atmosphere. Further, check-ins by Singapore passport holders will not be accepted.**  View House Rules
